page.title: 04Snamprogetti of Basingstoke
page.content: We{interviewed}the{Senior Personnel {Officer}who told us that the{company came from{Italy.}They{build}and{design {Oil Refineries. Snamprogetti}has been in{England}for{eleven}years. They chose to put their{head offices}in {Basingstoke}because of the{potential {growth}in the area.{Sixty_six percent of their{staff}are{men, thirty_four {percent women.}Most men are{engineers or work in{management,}the women are mostly{secretaries.}You need a variety of{qualifications}depending on your job. There are{supervisors on}all six floors. The Personnel Officer works {thirty-seven hours}a week, the{firm {operates flexi_time}and they have an hour for lunch.{Salaries}are{paid {monthly}and all staff get{twenty days {annual leave.}There is a{bar, canteen {Sports and Social Club}and{drinks {machine}for{tea breaks.}By Lucy Baker
